api_list.name: Get DNS Records

optional_parameters.name: record_type
optional_parameters.description:
Can be a comma seperated string with any of the following options:
a
ns
mx
txt
cname

To request multiple record types sample:
a,mx,cname

optional_parameters.name: response_type_seperator
optional_parameters.description: When response_type is set to target, you can set the response_type_seperator here. Default is \\\\\\\\n (newline) but you can do comma or pipe delimited if you want.

optional_parameters.name: response_type
optional_parameters.description: If response_type = target, will respond with either ip, txt or target of the requested dns record type. Useful when used in conjunction with response_type_seperator
